course_title: The Technical Terms of Medicine and Biological Science

99A.comments: PLEASE NOTE: Please register in the Wait List Section WLA if course is full or blocked. Students will be moved from the wait list in registration order. A blocked section with available seats indicates that transfers have not yet been processed that day. Due to considerable interest in this course, please refrain from contacting the Department regarding registration. We cannot make exceptions to the waitlist order.This section of the course is ONLINE- distance education. All communication will be by email. It is your responsibility to ensure you have a valid email account so that you can be contacted with important information and updates. You can update your contact information through the Student Service Centre.Login to the course through canvas.ubc.ca   Students who are new to Canvas will want to check out a UBC Student's Guide to Canvas For more information including resources for distance learners visit distancelearning.ubc.ca

WLC.comments: WLC is a Wait List for Section 99C of CLST 301 offered in January. Due to considerable interest in this course, please refrain from contacting the Department regarding your position on the waitlist, as we cannot provide this information.Students will be moved from the Wait List into the main course on a first come first served basis as spots open up.

description: Acquaints the student with the Greek and Latin elements from which most specialized terms of modern medicine are constructed. Intended primarily for students planning to enter the medical, pharmaceutical, or biological sciences.
